mentions.context: Briefly, the pipeline was based on Nextflow v19.07.0 [10] and processed data using the default options.. Read mapping onto the reference genome Darmor-bzh -v4 [2] was performed with Hisat2 v2.1.0 [11] , and transcript quantification with featureCounts v1.6.4 [12] according to the Darmor-bzh -v5 gene annotation [2] .
GO enrichment analyses were run with topGO R package (v2.40.0; [15] ) using the default parameters and Darmor-bzh -v5 GO annotation [2] .

For gene expression analyses, we used the AskoR R library [14] with the following steps: (1) data filtering, (2) data normalization, (3) visualization of correlations, and (4) differential expression analysis.
The pipeline outpout files were plotted and summarized with multiQC tools v1.7 [13] .
Processing of the RNA-seq data was carried out using the adapted nf-core RNA-seq pipeline version v1. 4.2 ( [9] ; https://github.com/nf-core/rnaseq

Briefly, the pipeline was based on Nextflow v19.07.0 [10] and processed data using the default options.. Read mapping onto the reference genome Darmor-bzh -v4 [2] was performed with Hisat2 v2.1.0 [11] , and transcript quantification with featureCounts v1.6.4 [12] according to the Darmor-bzh -v5 gene annotation [2] .

Briefly, the pipeline was based on Nextflow v19.07.0 [10] and processed data using the default options.. Read mapping onto the reference genome Darmor-bzh -v4 [2] was performed with Hisat2 v2.1.0 [11] , and transcript quantification with featureCounts v1.6.4 [12] according to the Darmor-bzh -v5 gene annotation [2] .
